T02D2849:188b-1: a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva ra tsinta ma ni tsakra wartti s'a dha nam /
T02D2849:188b-3: 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'khor los sgyur pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2849:188b-4: thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2849:188b-5: 'gro ba skyob mdzad thugs rje chen po'i gtso //
T02D2849:188b-6: zla ba'i nor lta'i sku mnga'i thugs rje dang //
T02D2849:188b-7: mchog sbyin de la gsum gyis phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2849:188b-8: nyi ma'i zer gyis mun bsal chu skyes kha 'byed ltar //
T02D2849:188b-9: thugs rje'i 'od kyis ma rig mun sel snying gi padma 'byed mdzad pa'i //
T02D2849:188b-10: sgrub thabs dam pa bka' drin dran phyir bri bar bya //
T02D2849:188b-11: me tog ra ba la sogs gtsang ma yid dga'i gnas su ni //
T02D2849:188b-12: rnam lnga hr'i: yis bsngags pa'i mandal legs par bya //
T02D2849:188b-13: kha dog dkar po'i me tog la sogs mchod pa ldan byas la //
T02D2849:188b-14: yi ge gsum ldan khrus kyis dri ma gnyis bkrus te //
T02D2849:188b-15: nyon mongs mtha' dag gzhig phyir bde ba'i stan la
T02D2849:188b-16: 'dug / yi ge gsum ldan hr'i: yis gnas bdag
T02D2849:188b-17: rnal 'byor bsrung // snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du hr'i: yig dkar po bsam //
T02D2849:188b-18: 'od kyis 'gro ba'i don byas 'jig rten dbang phyug spyan drangs te //
T02D2849:189a-0: yi ge gsum ldan hr'i: yis me tog @189a * //
T02D2849:189a-2: de nas sdig pa bshags shing mi bgyid sdom pa blang //
T02D2849:189a-3: rjes su yi rang skyabs su 'gro ba dang //
T02D2849:189a-4: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo //
T02D2849:189a-5: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho sgrol mdzad thugs rje'i 'od kyis blta //
T02D2849:189a-6: byams pa'i 'od kyis sems can 'jig rten mgon gyi gzugs su mthong //
T02D2849:189a-7: dga' ba'i 'od kyis sems can bde ldan rgyun mi 'chad par bsam //
T02D2849:189a-8: btang snyoms 'od kyis gzung 'dzin cha spangs chos nyid mthong bar blta //
T02D2849:189a-9: gzung ba dag phyir sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02D2849:189a-10: aom sra bh'a ba bishuddha: sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a wa shuddhonya\ham /
T02D2849:189a-11: 'dzin pa dag phyir sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2849:189a-12: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konya\ham /
T02D2849:189a-13: dri med nam mkha' lta bur kun bltas te //
T02D2849:189a-14: dbus su pam skyes padma dkar po sdong por bcas //
T02D2849:189a-15: lte bar hr'i:las byung ba chu shel 'od dang ldan //
T02D2849:189a-16: de dbus hr'i: yig las byung yid bzhin nor bu 'bar //
T02D2849:189a-17: hr'i: ldan 'od kyis 'gro ba'i don byas te /
T02D2849:189a-18: phyogs bcu'i rgyal sras bkug ste nor bu byin brlabs
T02D2849:189a-19: pas // de yongs gyur te 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhengs //
T02D2849:189a-20: zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'gying bag 'od zer dkar po 'bar //
T02D2849:189a-21: gru lang dkar po'i mdog bzhin gzhon nu rgyan cha can //
T02D2849:189a-22: phyag g-yas sbyin pa bzhi yi gter sbyin yid bzhin nor bu 'bar //
T02D2849:189a-23: phyag g-yon 'khor ba sgrol phyir 'khor lo rin chen ldan //
T02D2849:189a-24: spyi gtsug thor tshugs steng na gsung gi dbang phyug bzhugs //
T02D2849:189a-25: thugs rje'i 'od kyis 'gro ba kun khyab byed //
T02D2849:189a-26: rang snying pad steng zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2849:189a-27: nor bu'i dbus na hr'i: yig dkar po gsal //
T02D2849:189a-28: de 'od las byung sgrol ma khro gnyer can sogs phyogs bzhi'i lha //
T02D2849:189a-29: padma zla ba'i steng na 'gying bag ldan par bzhugs //
T02D2849:189a-30: phyi rol rgyal chen bzhi dang mchod pa'i lha mo sprul //
T02D2849:189a-31: de dag sku mdog so so'i phyag mtshan gtso bor mtshungs par blta //
T02D2849:189a-32: kun kyang thugs kar zla ba la gnas nor bu sa bon bsam //
T02D2849:189a-33: 'od zer lcags kyu dang mtshungs nam mkha' khyab spros te //
T02D2849:189a-34: ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs me tog la sogs pas //
T02D2849:189a-35: yongs su mchod nas legs par sngags 'dis gzhug /
T02D2849:189b-0: @189b dza:h'um bam ho:sa 'o ma chu ltar tha dang med pa'i 'khor lo la //
T02D2849:189b-1: skye mched gnas su zla ba hr'i:yig bsam //
T02D2849:189b-2: sku gsung thugs la yi ge gsum bltas la //
T02D2849:189b-3: thugs ka'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bskul //
T02D2849:189b-4: mchod bstod byas nas gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02D2849:189b-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shinytsa tu m'am /
T02D2849:189b-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis //
T02D2849:189b-7: lha yi chu ldan bum pas ni //
T02D2849:189b-8: 'khor lo la ni dbang bskur te //
T02D2849:189b-9: spyi bo 'od dpag med pas brgyan //
T02D2849:189b-10: gzugs sogs rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis //
T02D2849:189b-11: 'khor lo la ni legs par mchod //
T02D2849:189b-12: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la //
T02D2849:189b-13: de dag gis ni bstod par bya //
T02D2849:189b-14: de nas thugs kyi sa bon las //
T02D2849:189b-15: yi ge sngags kyi phreng ba ni //
T02D2849:189b-16: mar me lta bur rab bltas la //
T02D2849:189b-17: 'od kyis sems can thams cad ni //
T02D2849:189b-18: 'jig rten mgon por bsgrub byas te //
T02D2849:189b-19: yi ge'i phreng ba rnams la bstim //
T02D2849:189b-20: zhal dang lte ba'i bar du ni //
T02D2849:189b-21: rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phreng bar bsgom //
T02D2849:189b-22: aom tsinta ma ni tsakra bartsim ni padme a'a:hr'i:h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2849:189b-24: aom padma bha ra ta ke a'a:hr'i:h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2849:189b-25: nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so //
T02D2849:189b-26: rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pa rnams //
T02D2849:189b-27: sa bon yi ge gsum dang ldan //
T02D2849:189b-28: sv'a h'a phat ces bzlas par bya //
T02D2849:189b-30: rdo rje skud pa lta bu yi //
T02D2849:189b-31: 'khor bar bzlas pas lus khyab nas //
T02D2849:189b-32: sgrib pa gnyis spangs ye shes kyi //
T02D2849:189b-33: 'khor lo gsal bar ston par byed //
T02D2849:189b-35: lha rnams kyis ni bsnyen 'gyur te //
T02D2849:189b-36: thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i //
T02D2849:189b-37: 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed //
T02D2849:189b-38: bya ba gsum rdzogs sngags pa yis //
T02D2849:189b-39: rab dga' la sogs sa thob nas //
T02D2849:189b-40: sa bcu'i dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D2849:189b-41: sngags bzlas dus su cho ga ni //
T02D2849:189b-42: gtsang mar byas pa'i sa phyogs su //
T02D2849:189b-43: gu gul tsandan aa ka ru //
T02D2849:189b-44: puska sa dus tso ram ka //
T02D2849:189b-45: go ro tsa na shing gi bcud //
T02D2849:189b-46: legs sbyar dud dam nya phyis su //
T02D2849:189b-47: bzhag ste brtse ba la sogs pa'i //
T02D2849:189b-48: gzungs sngags stong phrag bzlas nas ni //
T02D2849:189b-49: phyag g-yas zla ba dri bcas pas //
T02D2849:189b-50: dkyil 'khor khru do la sogs byug / padma dkar po la sogs pa'i //
T02D2849:189b-51: me tog lha yi gnas su bkod //
T02D2849:189b-52: der ni pam skyes padma ni //
T02D2849:190a-2: rim pa gsum du gnas par bsam //
T02D2849:190a-3: lha rnams thugs kyi sa bon las //
T02D2849:190a-4: lha yi 'khor lo sprul byas te //
T02D2849:190a-5: padma rim pa gsum dag la //
T02D2849:190a-6: rim pas lha rnams bzhugs par bsam //
T02D2849:190a-7: ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs bstim //
T02D2849:190a-8: dbang bskur cho ga rdzogs pa dang //
T02D2849:190a-9: skye mched gnas gsum byin brlabs te //
T02D2849:190a-10: aa ka ru dang shel spang ka //
T02D2849:190a-11: bra ma tsa ri la sogs pa'i //
T02D2849:190a-12: dri zhim spos kyis mchod par bya //
T02D2849:190a-13: padma dkar po tsam ba ka / dz'a ya kundas mchod par bya //
T02D2849:190a-14: ga pur go ro tsa na dang //
T02D2849:190a-15: tsandan dkar por ldan pa yi //
T02D2849:190a-16: dri zhim mar gyi mar me dbul //
T02D2849:190a-17: s'a lu dkar po zho zan dang //
T02D2849:190a-18: sbrang bcas 'o ma dbul bar bya //
T02D2849:190a-19: dri zhim dkar po chu yis ni //
T02D2849:190a-20: skul byug ba dbul bar bya //
T02D2849:190a-21: na bza' rgyan dang me tog phreng //
T02D2849:190a-22: gdugs dang ba dan rgyal mtshan dang //
T02D2849:190a-23: rlung yab la sogs rgyan rnams dbul //
T02D2849:190a-24: dril bu pi wang rdza rnga dang //
T02D2849:190a-25: gling bu rnga rings pa ta ha //
T02D2849:190a-26: sgra mchog rnams kyis mchod par bya //
T02D2849:190a-27: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D2849:190a-28: bla ma 'khor lor bcas pa la //
T02D2849:190a-29: bstod nas gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02D2849:190a-30: 'khor lo'i lha rnams thams cad kyi //
T02D2849:190a-31: thugs kar pad steng zla ba la //
T02D2849:190a-32: hr'i: yig sngags kyis bskor bar blta //
T02D2849:190a-33: 'od zer sngags kyi phreng ba ni //
T02D2849:190a-34: zhal nas byung ste rjes gnang tshul //
T02D2849:190a-35: bdag gi zhal zhugs thugs kar thim //
T02D2849:190a-36: de dag khri phrag sngags bzlas nas //
T02D2849:190a-37: zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag po //
T02D2849:190a-38: sngags phreng kha dog bzhir shes nas //
T02D2849:190a-39: mdun gyi dkyil 'khor lha rnams la //
T02D2849:190a-40: rjes su mthun pa'i gsol ba gdab //
T02D2849:190a-42: 'khor lor bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis //
T02D2849:190a-43: gang 'dod dngos grub sbyin par bsam //
T02D2849:190a-44: de nas lha rnams thugs kar bsdu //
T02D2849:190a-45: de ltar cho ga byas nas ni //
T02D2849:190a-46: mchod bstod gsol gdab sngon 'gro pas //
T02D2849:190a-47: gzungs sngags bzlas pa brtson par bya //
T02D2849:190a-48: bsnyen pa rdzogs par gyur na ni //
T02D2849:190a-49: gang zhig bdag gam na da ba 'am //
T02D2849:190a-50: gdon chen nyen dang tshe nyams dang //
T02D2849:190a-51: 'jigs pa brgyad kyis nyen pa la //
T02D2849:190a-52: bsrung ba'i cho ga brtsam par bya //
T02D2849:190a-53: shis par gyur pa'i nyi ma la //
T02D2849:190a-54: ras sam shing lo gro ga ni //
T02D2849:190b-0: dri zhim spos @190b kyis bdugs pa dang //
T02D2849:190b-1: nye ba'i snying po stong phrag gcig / hr'i: bcas sngags kyis byin brlabs te //
T02D2849:190b-2: gur gum go ro tsa na dang //
T02D2849:190b-3: kor si sha ldan khu ba yis //
T02D2849:190b-4: 'khor lo legs par bri bar bya //
T02D2849:190b-5: me tog dkar po'i yu ba yis //
T02D2849:190b-7: dbus su hr'i: chen bris pa'i nang //
T02D2849:190b-8: sgrub pos legs par bri bar bya //
T02D2849:190b-10: yi ge gsum ldan nye snying po //
T02D2849:190b-11: hr'i: yig bar du sgrub pa po //
T02D2849:190b-12: raksha ku ru ldan par bri //
T02D2849:190b-14: snying po spel sngags ldan par bri //
T02D2849:190b-15: padma'i mu khyud tha ma la //
T02D2849:190b-16: rtsa ba'i gzungs sngags gong dang mtshungs //
T02D2849:190b-17: gtsang spra ldan pas bris nas ni //
T02D2849:190b-18: dkyil 'khor dri yis legs byugs la //
T02D2849:190b-19: me tog dkar po dri zhim po //
T02D2849:190b-20: sil ma legs par bkram pa yi //
T02D2849:190b-21: steng du 'khor lo legs par gzhag / lha rnams thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis //
T02D2849:190b-23: pam bskyed padma'i gnas rnams su //
T02D2849:190b-24: gzungs sngags mar me'i phreng ba bzhin //
T02D2849:190b-25: 'od ldan gsal bar bsgom bar bya //
T02D2849:190b-26: de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis //
T02D2849:190b-27: lha yi 'khor lo spyan drangs te //
T02D2849:190b-28: mchod dang bstod pa byas nas ni //
T02D2849:190b-29: 'khor lo la ni bstim par bya //
T02D2849:190b-30: lha rnams thugs ka nas spros pa'i //
T02D2849:190b-31: rtsa ba'i gzungs sngags la sogs pa'i //
T02D2849:190b-32: khri phrag bzlas pa 'khor lor bstim //
T02D2849:190b-33: des ni srung ba'i sgrub pa rdzogs //
T02D2849:190b-34: mchog gi dngos grub sgrub 'dod pas //
T02D2849:190b-35: gong gi dkyil 'khor legs byas te //
T02D2849:190b-36: dbus su gtso bo la sogs pa //
T02D2849:190b-37: lha rnams cho ga gsum gyis bskyed //
T02D2849:190b-38: ye shes spyan 'dren la sogs pa //
T02D2849:190b-39: cho ga'i yan lag thams cad kyang //
T02D2849:190b-40: gong gi mchod pa'i rdzas rnams kyis //
T02D2849:190b-41: dus gsum legs par mchod byas la //
T02D2849:190b-42: yi ge grangs kyi 'bum phrag bzla //
T02D2849:190b-43: thun mtshams gsol gdab bskor ba ni //
T02D2849:190b-44: brgya 'am stong phrag re re bya //
T02D2849:190b-45: de tshe thugs rje byin rlabs kyis //
T02D2849:190b-46: 'khor lo zhal stong yang na ni //
T02D2849:190b-47: dngos grub rjes su gnang ba sbyin //
T02D2849:190b-49: dri zhim shel gyi mdog dang mtshungs //
T02D2849:190b-50: sems can thams cad dad gyur cing //
T02D2849:190b-52: nam mkhar 'phur dang shing rta zhon //
T02D2849:191a-0: rgya mtsho sgrol dang ri rgyal 'dzeg / nor bu 'khor @191a * //
T02D2849:191a-2: padma dkar po zla ba mthong //
T02D2849:191a-3: hr'i: bcas yi ge zhal zhugs mthong //
T02D2849:191a-4: rang mdog dkar po khrus byed na //
T02D2849:191a-5: de dag 'grub pa'i rtags su bshad //
T02D2849:191a-6: de nas sman mchog ri lu bsgrub //
T02D2849:191a-7: bum pa bzang po'i nang du ni //
T02D2849:191a-8: yungs kar ba yi rnam lnga dang //
T02D2849:191a-10: shi ri khanda ga pur dang //
T02D2849:191a-11: rnam par rgyal ba'i aa ru ra //
T02D2849:191a-12: sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga //
T02D2849:191a-13: dri lnga snying po lnga bcas te //
T02D2849:191a-14: rgyu skar rgyal gyi nyi ma la //
T02D2849:191a-15: bum par stsal te dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02D2849:191a-16: dbus su legs par gzhag par bya //
T02D2849:191a-17: de steng gdugs dang ba dan dang //
T02D2849:191a-18: phyogs bzhir rgyal mtshan gdags par bya //
T02D2849:191a-19: der ni lha yi 'khor lo ni //
T02D2849:191a-20: cho ga gsum gyis bskyed par bya //
T02D2849:191a-21: ye shes spyan drangs la sogs pa //
T02D2849:191a-22: cho ga rdzogs par byas nas ni //
T02D2849:191a-23: dus gsum mchod dang bstod par bya //
T02D2849:191a-24: 'jig rten mgon po'i thugs kar ni //
T02D2849:191a-25: pam bskyed padma zla ba'i steng//
T02D2849:191a-26: aa las bum pa bzang por gyur //
T02D2849:191a-27: nang du hr'i:sa mtshan ri lu bsam //
T02D2849:191a-28: gtso bo la sogs lha rnams kyi //
T02D2849:191a-29: thugs las rtsa ba'i snying po dang //
T02D2849:191a-30: nye snying spros nas ri lur bstim //
T02D2849:191a-31: thun mtshams bskor ba brgya phrag byas //
T02D2849:191a-32: de tshe ri lu lhar mthong na //
T02D2849:191a-34: ri lu rgyal chen bzhir mthong na //
T02D2849:191a-36: ri lu nyi ma zla bar mthong //
T02D2849:191a-38: ri lu 'khor lo nor bur mthong //
T02D2849:191a-40: de tshe bum pa'i gzugs mthong na //
T02D2849:191a-43: sgra byung lha yi snyan dang ldan //
T02D2849:191a-46: dri yis nang rnams zhi byed 'gyur //
T02D2849:191a-47: gzhan yang bzlas pa la sogs pa'i //
T02D2849:191a-48: sgrub pa gzungs kyi cho gar shes //
T02D2849:191a-49: bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di brtsams pas //
T02D2849:191a-50: de yis bsod nams gang thob pa //
T02D2849:191a-51: 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad kun //
T02D2849:191a-52: 'jig rten mgon po thob par shog /'phags pa 'jig
T02D2849:191a-53: rten dbang phyug yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'khor los
T02D2849:191a-55: slob dpon dze t'a ris mdzad pa rdzogs so /
